definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to work in the fields (esp. young school-leavers)/forced agricultural experience for city intellectuals

sentences.english: The mist-filled valley and flickering lights below looked strangely welcoming.
sentences.chinese: 薄霧籠罩的山谷和山下閃爍的燈光出奇地好看。

sentences.english: The peasant led us down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 那個農民帶我們朝山下走。

sentences.english: Wooing the Granite State is fiendishly hard.
sentences.chinese: 要贏得“花崗岩州”有如過刀山下火海。

sentences.english: Escort the emperor silver team from wu founded the mountain after.
sentences.chinese: 護送皇銀的車隊從武南莊山下經過之時。

sentences.english: Those who are afraid of climbing the peak, forever wandering down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 害怕攀登高峯的人，永遠在山下徘徊。

sentences.english: When rolling down the hill, he snatched at a rock.
sentences.chinese: 在向山下滾的過程中，他一把抓住了一塊岩石。

sentences.english: The road twisted down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 這條路彎彎曲曲通往山下。

sentences.english: The building extends from the mountain foot to the mountain top and almost covers the whole peak.
sentences.chinese: 建築從山下直到山頂幾乎佔了整座山峯。

sentences.english: They rode at full gallop down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 他們騎着馬往山下飛奔而去。

sentences.english: The foot of Batu Batu lake also known for its beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 巴都山下的巴都湖也以風光漂亮著稱。

sentences.english: He noticed a light further down the hill.
sentences.chinese: 蓋伯瑞爾注意到在山下有燈光。

sentences.english: By the time your father got down the hill, his brother was nothing but blood and pulp .
sentences.chinese: 等你爸爸來到山下，他叔叔已經是血肉模糊的一堆了。

sentences.english: But that unexpected sight at the foot of my brothers bed was it for me.
sentences.chinese: 但意想不到的視線，在山下我的兄弟牀，是它爲我。

sentences.english: There are people coming down from the villages.
sentences.chinese: 也有人從山下的村裏跑上來看病。

definition: Shanshang township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
halfway up a mountain/lit. waist of mountain
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
